ygData.subject: Re: monk on the move
ygData.msgSnippet: Go to unrest and get a cleric and maybe one or two others around your level and be an exterminator. Kill bugs like mad you will get great exp. When you enter
ygData.messageBody:
Go to unrest and get a cleric and maybe one or two others around your level
and be an exterminator. Kill bugs like mad you will get great exp. When you
enter the zone camp the far back left wall in the corner by the tree you can
be fairly safe from trains back there. And the exp is great. About 10 kills
solo = one bar of exp.

hope this helps

Heldenfeld
----- Original Message -----
From: Steve Danuser <danu@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, September 05, 1999 12:30 AM
Subject: [EQ-Monks] monk on the move


> From: Steve Danuser <danu@...>
>
> I'm a Freeport monk who just hit level 14 and am wondering what to do
next.
> My circuit of N Ro, E Comm, and W Comm (parts of it, anyway) have gotten
me
> this far, but opponents now are getting to be either too easy around there
> or still way too tough, so I want a zone that's going to have a good share
> of blues for me, plus whites, yellows, and realistic reds I can fight in
> groups.
>
> A 20th level Necro friend of mine wants to bring me to Highpass to help me
> level quickly, but I'm nervous that if he's not around I may not be able
to
> solo. Any thoughts on this?
>
> Anybody else have suggestions? I'd prefer to stay on the eastern side of
> Antonica or on Faydwer.
>
> Also, can I get some recommendations on jewelry that's in my price range?
> I've got all of 30 plat to my name.
>
> __________________________
> Moorgard, monk striving for virtue
>
